en.metaOgDescription: Eduardo Marquez is a Software Engineer with a focus on backend development, with practical experience in Linux and MacOS, using languages like Java, TypeScript, and Python.
en.metaDescription: Eduardo Marquez is a Software Engineer with a focus on backend development, with practical experience in Linux and MacOS, using languages like Java, TypeScript, and Python.
en.bio:
Software Engineer @ Parque Mirante.
Bachelor of Computer Science, Universidade Anhembi Morumbi, Graduated in 2022.
en.certAWS: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
en.job0Title: ðŸš§ WEB DEVELOPER | AUTOMATION SPECIALIST | PARQUE MIRANTE
en.job0Desc1: Custom WordPress plugins and shortcodes development.
en.job0Desc2: Google Tag Manager implementation for analytics and campaign tracking.
en.job0Desc3: Automation flows with n8n for system integration and data visualization.
en.job1Title: ðŸš§ BACKEND DEVELOPER, DEVOPS | MOONSHOT ROBOTS
en.job1Desc1: RESTful API development with Strapi (Node.js) for web and mobile applications.
en.job1Desc2: CI/CD pipeline with Bitbucket, AWS CodeCommit and CodeDeploy.
en.job1Desc3: QR Code generation and validation system integrated with the backend.
en.job1Desc4: Routing system using graph algorithms for optimized event navigation.
en.job2Desc1: Cloud deployment using AWS EC2 and Amazon RDS.
en.job3Desc2: App deployment to Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
en.job4Desc1: API development with Fastify (Node) and Flask (Python).
en.job4Desc2: AI software development for the Anna robot project.
en.job4Desc4: Cloud services with GCP and AWS, containerization with Docker.
en.job5Title: ðŸš§ SOFTWARE DEVELOPER | SUPPORT - SISTEMAS DE GESTAO
en.job5Desc1: ERP migration from Cobol to Java Web.
en.job5Desc2: Full-Stack development with Vue.js, Java, SpringBoot and Hibernate.
en.job5Desc3: Database management with Postgres and Oracle.
en.project1Desc1: The dropcode platform was created for sharing code snippets between your friends and colleagues.
en.project1Desc2:
Developed the platform in Next.js 13, using the new app router.
Deployed the platform on Vercel.
en.project1Desc3:
An API in NodeJS was developed to facilitate interactions with the database. Fastify was used for handling routes, Prisma for simplified database management, while Zod provided secure validation of incoming data.
The API was deployed on Cyclic.
en.project1Desc4:
The database was created in PostgreSQL.
Stored it in Supabase.
